title: League of Legends app just keeps bouncing in dock
body: I recently reinstalled LoL and played it a couple times, one of these times being earlier today, and now when I try to open LoL the app just keeps bouncing in the dock and won't open. I am currently running on a Mac OS X El Capitan.

replies.body: When the program just sits there and bounces, but never actually opens, it might be getting blocked by your OS. If your pc's OS doesn't recognize a program as being safe to run it can completely block it from opening at all. Check out this guide for how to adjust [**Mac's administrator settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9), and let me know if that helps.
I have the same problem but I didn't reinstall :P
